com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.internal.network

Class PacketHandlerHooked

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.internal.network.PacketHandlerHooked
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PacketHandler
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CommonPacketHandler

    public abstract class PacketHandlerHooked
extends java.lang.Object
implements PacketHandler
    Basic packet handler implementation for handling packets using a send/receive hook. The handlePacketSend(player, packet, wasCancelled) and handlePacketReceive(player, packet, wasCancelled) methods should be called by an additional listener hook.

        public boolean handlePacketSend(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                       java.lang.Object packet,
                       boolean wasCancelled)
        Handles a packet before it is being sent to a player
        Parameters:
        player - for which the packet was meant
        packet - that is handled
